CustomField.formula: IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "A", ABM_Last_PES__c = "B"),"+1", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "A", ABM_Last_PES__c = "C"),"+2", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "A", ABM_Last_PES__c = "D"),"+3", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "B", ABM_Last_PES__c = "A"),"-1", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "B", ABM_Last_PES__c = "C"),"+1", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "B", ABM_Last_PES__c = "D"),"+2", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "C", ABM_Last_PES__c = "A"),"-2", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "C", ABM_Last_PES__c = "B"),"-1", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "C", ABM_Last_PES__c = "D"),"+1", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "D", ABM_Last_PES__c = "A"),"-3", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "D", ABM_Last_PES__c = "B"),"-2", IF(AND( bizible2__Engagement_Score__c = "D", ABM_Last_PES__c = "A"),"-1", "0" ))))))))))))
CustomField.label: ABM | PES Change
